trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Raleigh
There was one other sighting in Raleigh on or around December 8th 2012
divs: sighting detailson 12\08 at around 8:02 pm, i was driving on hwy 401 near wake tech campus, saw a very bright, pulsating, shape shifting object, which i can only describe as an orb or sphere somewhat, stationary just over some trees. the more i drove towards it, the bigger it became. people driving alongside me noticed the object in the sky aswell, as i glanced over while at a redlight.
Summary: bright pulsating orb in north raleigh
